item.name: Admins
item.description: This folder contains all the routes designated to manage Admin Resource Objects.

request.description: Creates a new admin record with priviledges for a specific board
Gets a list of all admin records appointed by a specific user.
Gets a list of all admin records which are in charge of the same board.
Gets an admin's record based on his user_id
Gets a list of all the admin records ordered by  name
Deletes a record indicating a user's admin priviledges to a board.
Search by an admin by name.
List admins filtered by specific system division.
Assigns a board to an admin.
Assigns divisions to an admin.
Delete an admin from the admin registry.
Gets an admin's record based on his admin_id
Write route so super user or admin_admins can list users by "performance" i.e number of issues solved.

item.name: Boards
item.description: This folder contains all the routes designated to manage Board Resource Objects.

formdata.value: centro universitario de ciencias biologicas y agropecuarias
Aqui crian animales y plantan cosas

request.description: Creates a new board
Gets board info based on slug.
Gets list of boards (shirt_name, id, slug)

urlencoded.value: {"name":"centro universitario de ciencias exactas e ingenierias", "short_name":"cucei","description":"editado","active":true}

request.description: Edits basic board info based on slug
Gets a list of boards ordered from latest to oldest.
Deletes a specified board if logged in user has necessary priviledges.
Updates the specified board's image.

item.name: Issues
item.description: This folder contains all the routes designated to manage Issues Resource Objects.

urlencoded.value: I have a huge issue...I'm drunk

request.description: Reports an issue as the logged in user.
Gets info about a specific issue based on the ID you pass.

Gets the issues corresponging to the current logged in user's credentials; if he has a board assigned he can only see the pertinent issues related to his board and allowed divisions, if he doesn't have a board assigned he'll view all issues across the system.
Gets the issues of the division requested if the user has it assigned, if the user has an assigned board it'll only show the ones assigned to him.
Gets the issues of the board requested if the user has it assigned, if the user has an assigned board it'll only show the ones assigned to him.

item.name: Get Issues by Board and Division

request.description: Gets the issues of the board and division requested.
Resolves an Issue by logged in admin.

item.name: Networking Requests
item.description: This folder contains all the routes designated to manage InfoRequest Resource Objects.

request.description: Send another user an info request.
Check if logged in user has authorized access to the profile's info.
Get list unanswered requests sent by logged in user.
Get list unanswered requests received by logged in user.
Gets logged in user's accepted requests positively, i.e list of access credentials (people who have access to profile info).
Gets logged in user's people with blocked profile access.
Gets the information from a request based on an ID and if current user is an actor of said request.
Responds negatively to all requests that the user hasn't responded to.
Accept or deny an info request.
Any user in the friend relationship can opt-out removing the access request.
Changes access permission of an existing request relationship.

item.name: Notifications
item.description: This folder contains all the routes designated to manage Notification Resource Objects.

request.description: Get's all the unseen notifications for logged in user.
Get's all the latest N notifications for logged in user.
Get the requested notification by logged in user.
Sets 'seen' property to the notification selected.
Sets 'seen' property to all the unseen notifications of the user.
Removes a specific use notification permanently.
Removes all notifications of logged in user permanently.

item.name: Replies
item.description: This folder contains all the routes designated to manage Reply Resource Objects and SubReplies.

request.description: Posts a SubReply, use the 'to' field to answer/address someone and send notification to him/her.
Gets the replies of a thread based on a thread id but without subreplies
Gets the replies of a thread based on a thread id with subreply field.
Reply o a thread based on it's ID
Get a reply without the replies field
Get a reply with the replies field
Gets the replies of a thread based on a thread id with subreply field limited to two.
Overwrites reply content and categorizes the comment as inappropriate.
Overwrites subreply content and categorizes the comment as inappropriate.
Reply to a comment, optional "to" field.

item.name: Settings
item.description: Routes to get public system settings

request.description: Gets the existent system priviledges.
Gets the existent system issue categories.
Gets the system's max settings and defaults for threads.

item.name: Threads
item.description: This folder contains all the routes designated to manage Thread Resource Objects.

formdata.value: I changed my profile pic boyzzz

request.description: Posts a thread in a specific board
List the threads from a board that are still alive ordered by ranking
List the threads from a board that are still alive ordered by most recent date
Search for a thread by title within a specific board
Get a thread object.
Get the first X top threads in the entire site.
Set's the "alive" property of the thread to false so it stops being displayable.

item.name: Users
item.description: This folder contains all the routes designated to manage User Resource Objects.

request.description: Creates a user in the system, this will change in the future.
Logs a user and gets JWT from server, will change in the future.
Get an user profile and get corresponding data based on access level.
Update an user profile
Logs a user and gets JWT from server, will change in the future.
Search an user by username
Gets the users who coincide with the array of priviledges sent.
Edits the user alias if cooldown time has passed.
Changes the logged in user's profile pic.
